title: Bg. 11.23
sanskrit: रूपं महत्ते बहुवक्‍त्रनेत्रंमहाबाहो बहुबाहूरुपादम् ।बहूदरं बहुदंष्ट्राकरालंदृष्ट्वा लोका: प्रव्यथितास्तथाहम् ॥ २३ ॥
transliteration: rūpaṁ mahat te bahu-vaktra-netraṁmahā-bāho bahu-bāhūru-pādambahūdaraṁ bahu-daṁṣṭrā-karālaṁdṛṣṭvā lokāḥ pravyathitās tathāham
literary_trans: O mighty-armed one, all the planets with their demigods are disturbed at seeing Your great form, with its many faces, eyes, arms, thighs, legs and bellies and Your many terrible teeth; and as they are disturbed, so am I.O mighty-armed one, all the planets with their demigods are disturbed at seeing Your great form, with its many faces, eyes, arms, thighs, legs and bellies and Your many terrible teeth; and as they are disturbed, so am I.
